title: Constrain-based analysis of gene deletion on the metabolic flux redistribution of Saccharomyces Cerevisiae
journal: · Journal of Biomedical Science and Engineering
abstract: Based on the gene-protein-reaction (GPR) model of S. cerevisiae_iND750 and the method of constraint-based analysis, we first calculated the metabolic flux distribution of S. cere-visiae_iND750. Then we calc…
